languages.text: "Скверна смывается кровью. Мы очистим его дух, ибо для тела надежды уже нет. Никто не возвращается из объятий проклятья".
"Corruption is washed away by blood. We will cleanse his spirit, as there is no hope for his body now. None return from the curse's embrace."
languages.original_text: "Скверна смывается кровью. Мы очистим его дух, ибо для тела надежды уже нет. Никто не возвращается из объятий проклятья".

traits.locale_text: "Corruption is washed away by blood. We will cleanse his spirit, as there is no hope for his body now. None return from the curse's embrace."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Corruption is washed away by blood. We will cleanse his spirit, as there is no hope for his body now. None return from the curse's embrace."

languages.text: “只有鲜血才能洗刷腐化。我们可以净化他的灵魂，但他的肉体已经彻底没希望了，没人能从诅咒的怀抱中回来。”
languages.original_text: "Corruption is washed away by blood. We will cleanse his spirit, as there is no hope for his body now. None return from the curse's embrace."

traits.locale_text: “只有鲜血才能洗刷腐化。我们可以净化他的灵魂，但他的肉体已经彻底没希望了，没人能从诅咒的怀抱中回来。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「腐敗は血で清める。俺たちは奴の魂を浄化するが、肉体はもうどうしようもない。呪いに抱かれた者は戻らない」
languages.original_text: "Corruption is washed away by blood. We will cleanse his spirit, as there is no hope for his body now. None return from the curse's embrace."

traits.locale_text: 「腐敗は血で清める。俺たちは奴の魂を浄化するが、肉体はもうどうしようもない。呪いに抱かれた者は戻らない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «La sangre lava la corrupción. Purificaremos su espíritu, porque su cuerpo ya no tiene remedio. Nadie ha vuelto de garras de la maldición».
languages.original_text: "Corruption is washed away by blood. We will cleanse his spirit, as there is no hope for his body now. None return from the curse's embrace."

traits.locale_text: «La sangre lava la corrupción. Purificaremos su espíritu, porque su cuerpo ya no tiene remedio. Nadie ha vuelto de garras de la maldición».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « La corruption se lave dans le sang. Nous purifierons son esprit, car il n'y a plus rien que nous puissions faire pour son corps. Nul ne peut être délivré de la malédiction. »
languages.original_text: "Corruption is washed away by blood. We will cleanse his spirit, as there is no hope for his body now. None return from the curse's embrace."

traits.locale_text: « La corruption se lave dans le sang. Nous purifierons son esprit, car il n'y a plus rien que nous puissions faire pour son corps. Nul ne peut être délivré de la malédiction. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Verderbnis wird durch Blut fortgewaschen. Wir werden seinen Geist reinigen, denn für seinen Körper besteht keine Hoffnung mehr. Aus der Umarmung des Fluchs kehrt niemand zurück."
languages.original_text: "Corruption is washed away by blood. We will cleanse his spirit, as there is no hope for his body now. None return from the curse's embrace."

traits.locale_text: "Verderbnis wird durch Blut fortgewaschen. Wir werden seinen Geist reinigen, denn für seinen Körper besteht keine Hoffnung mehr. Aus der Umarmung des Fluchs kehrt niemand zurück."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Yozlaşma, kanla temizlenir. Bedeni için yapabileceğimiz bir şey olmadığından ruhunu temizleyeceğiz. Kimse lanetin kollarından kurtulamaz."
languages.original_text: "Corruption is washed away by blood. We will cleanse his spirit, as there is no hope for his body now. None return from the curse's embrace."

traits.locale_text: "Yozlaşma kanla temizlendi. Ruhunu da temizleyeceğiz çünkü bedeni için yapabileceğimiz bir şey yok. Kimse lanetin kollarından kurtulamaz."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
